access-recovery-form.unknown_error: We can't issue a one-time code for this account at the moment. If you've already requested the code, please wait a few minutes before trying again.

customer-form.invalid_credential_error: Incorrect password. Please make sure you've entered your current or temporary password and try again.
customer-form.change_password_step_1: Let's start with your current password. A temporary password also works if you have one.
customer-form.change_password_step_2: Now enter a new password and hit Continue to apply changes to your account.
customer-form.change_password_step_3: All done! You can now use your new password when logging in.
